title: My season 4 victorious ward skin disappeared after recent patch
body: So after the last patch, my season 4 victorious ward skin disappeared. Not sure why or how, maybe it has something to do with being booted from my aram game after patch 6.15 went live? Proof is i met the credentials to get the skin in season 4 (the 50/50 points in ranked 5s), but now i dont have it. Would  be nice if this was looked into, thanks. My ign is 1 800 JAN ITOR.

replies.body:
Hey! 

Don't worry, you still have it! We're aware of a bug causing display issues with ward skins. D:
Same with me I have no idea why but it just disappeared in the ward skin selection in the champion selection....
Yeah mine to ^^ Not sure whats going on. I had it selected. Switched to a different ward skin, then when i went to equip it the following game it had completely disappeared
There is current a bug preventing you from seeing certain ward skins, you still own them but you can't see them. A fix for this is under development.
Also, my friend who I got the ward skin with through playing ranked 5s, was in the same aram match as I was, and his is missing too. His ign is Wishpool6
